cards.rules_text:
When Vienna enters, create your choice of a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token or a Cell token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Tap two untapped tokens you control: Teach Vienna your choice of flying or vigilance. [i](Put that kind of counter on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]

Whenever another nontoken Wizard enters under your control, it experiments. [i](Exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. If you don't, you may play the exiled card this turn.)[/i]

When Malevolent Practitioner enters or attacks, you may mill a card.

[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, put a time counter on Timewinder.
Remove four time counters from Timewinder: Shuffle your hand into your library, then draw four cards.
Remove six time counters from Timewinder: Take an extra turn after this one.

Whenever you attack, up to one other target creature experiments X times, where X is the number of attacking creatures. [i](To experiment, exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If you don't, you may play the exiled card this turn.)[/i]

Artifact creature cards in your hand without dormant have dormant. Their dormant cost is equal to their mana cost reduced by {2}. This effect cannot reduce a cost to less than one mana. [i](You may cast it for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
Whenever Diligent Animator deals combat damage to an opponent, choose a noncreature artifact you control with power and toughness. That artifact becomes a creature.

Ward {2}
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card for each of that spell's colors. Put those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Until end of turn, spells you cast with the names of the revealed cards cost {0} to cast.

Whenever Sophia is exiled from anywhere other than the battlefield, she gains “You may cast this spell from exile by paying {1}{U}{R} rather than paying its mana cost.”
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library faced-down. You may look at it and play it for as long as it remains exiled. It costs {2} less to cast.

[-8]: You may cast any number of cards players own in exile without paying their mana cost.

[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains vigilance until end of turn.

You may cast cards exiled with Dylan as long as a creature you control dealt damage to an opponent this turn.
[+2]: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn. You may exile the top card of your library.
[+1]: Exile up to two cards from a graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create Goggles, a legendary 3/3 green Elemental Dragon creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
[+1]: Whenever a creature you control attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
